description:
Provides an IAM role inline policy.

~> **NOTE:** For a given role, this resource is incompatible with using the [`aws_iam_role` resource](/docs/providers/aws/r/iam_role.html) `inline_policy` argument. When using that argument and this resource, both will attempt to manage the role's inline policies and Terraform will show a permanent difference.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Name.description:
The name of the role policy. If omitted, Terraform will
assign a random, unique name.

NamePrefix.description:
Creates a unique name beginning with the specified
prefix. Conflicts with `name`.

Policy.description: The inline policy document. This is a JSON formatted string. For more information about building IAM policy documents with Terraform, see the [AWS IAM Policy Document Guide](https://learn.hashicorp.com/terraform/aws/iam-policy).

Role.description: The IAM role to attach to the policy.
